title: Loneliness

how_to_play: The player moves toward the mouse
Touch floating balls to befriend them
Befriended balls fly toward the player
The (broken) bar at the top represents the player's loneliness. If it get to 0, the game ends
Touching a red kitten makes all balls fly away and shortens the loneliness bar

description: Experimental little something. The game was intended to change colors as your character got more or less lonely.
You are a lonely kitten. Touch colored balls to befriend them and lessen your loneliness. Just beware the evil kittens.
